comments.body: :crying_cat_face: I wonder if `hie-bios` should make it possible to reuse the logic for flag filtering even if you define your own `.hie-bios` file.
Where does da-ghci get its list of include files from? Do we have this list hardcoded twice? (Not that that is a problem - I'd rather it zero - but if not, two is fine)

`da-ghci` lists all files explicitly rather than going via include paths. Iâ€™ve talked to @aherrmann-da about this and it looks like we can probably change that at which point we can just reuse that.
